name: Out For Delivery
description:
Out For Delivery is a 360° interactive documentary following a food courier named Zhang as he conducts daily deliveries in Beijing on January 23, 2020 – a day before Lunar New Year's Eve, and the day Wuhan shut down due to COVID-19.

Composed of consecutive real-life shots taken throughout a single day, this 42 minute slice-of-life experience presents in 360° view of the courier's journey. Minimal narration provides context that players wouldn't otherwise know, while the world itself displays voluminous anecdotal information.

What to expect (without spoilers)?

  • Ride a scooter in Beijing around Lunar New Year
  • Get lost in maze-like apartment complexes
  • Take a glimpse of the moments before global lockdown
